website_summaries.verdict: Deep enough to soak your feet and ankles. Unlike many other foot spas, you can safely add oils or salts to the water without damaging the unit.
pros: Motorized rollers, powerful vibration, and soothing bubbles relieve foot pain
cons: Heavy when full, and there are no wheels for easy transport

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item and it cracked beneath the pivot handle. The seller replaced with a new unit (after a very long return/replacement period, several weeks) but the replacement unit would not hold water and leaked all over the floor. Watch the video (if Amazon posts). Useless and frustrating. Poor quality by manufacturer. Poor return/replacement follow through by seller. DO NOT PURCHASE... BUY SOMETHING THAT YOU CAN ACTUALLY USE!
customer_reviews.author: M Wininger

customer_reviews.title: Broke after using twice
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my wife as a christmas present, she loved it. She used it 2 times and on the 3rd time all of the functions stopped working. The controll panel lights up how ever nothing works. I have e-mailed the store asking for help. Will update when we hear back....
customer_reviews.author: Thor Lie

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 3rd use!
customer_reviews.text: Used 3 times and now it doesn’t work at all. What a disappointment. Returning this immediately! The heat malfunctioned and stayed on, and the bubbles were non functional-couldnt operate massage.. Safety issues all over the place with this unit.. Do not purchase unless you are ready to return it..
customer_reviews.author: Nina D., MBA

customer_reviews.title: DANGEROUS! WARNING!!!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this negative stars I would. I’m a nurse. I just finished a 13 hour shift. Looked forward to using this for the first time. Read the instructions fully. Filled it up according to direction. So far so good...or so I thought. About 5 minutes into my use of this piece of junk, I looked down and saw that it flooded my entire floor. So after a long shift I ended up having to mop up my entire floor. Take my advice PLEASE. It’s an electrical HAZARD. It’s DANGEROUS.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this foot spa.. do t waste your money on a cheap one.
customer_reviews.text: This came super fast! Our whole family loves this foot spa. Based on reviews we paid more for this one opposed to the cheaper models. It keeps the water hot to the temp you desire and the under foot rolling massager is great. It fits tiny feet to very large. My husband is a size 11/12 and his fit fine. Love it. Easy to clean too.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Polishchuk

customer_reviews.title: 15 minutes of Feet (Fame)
customer_reviews.text: The product stopped working after 1st use. After that, it doesn’t turn on. I attached a video to demonstrate. The product works great if it works, the heating in the water is very quick, and the massaging roller works as described. It's a shame the product didn't work after 15 minutes while on.
customer_reviews.author: Ming Gao

customer_reviews.title: It leaked and had to be returned.
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything about this except that it leaks! The third time I used it, there was a steady stream of water leaking out the bottom. Edit: I received a replacement unit, and I thought it was working great. I wanted to wait for a few uses before changing my rating, and the replacement started having issues, too, after about the fifth use. The massager started randomly turning on by itself. I can deal with that, since all I had to do was push the massager button and it would turn off again. But at the tenth use, it started leaking. In the same exact place as last time, so there is clearly a defect in the manufacturing.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Coombs

customer_reviews.title: Leaked profusely at under 6 months post purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter as a Christmas present and in less than 6 months it developed a sudden water leak that rendered it completely useless. Water all over the floor nearly instantly. It wasn't even like it was a slow leak that developed into a large one.She didn't even have her feet in it at the time. It was just warming up the water. Extremely dissatisfied. For the price you would think this was a product that would last.
customer_reviews.author: K. FRIES

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work after about 10 uses.
customer_reviews.text: I took this out of my closet for my husband to use tonight and it didn’t work. I bought this in June of 2017 but have probably used it a total of 10 times max. I’m very upset that I spent this much money on a foot massager that doesn’t work after about 10 uses. It looks brand new and is brand new. My husband is a Diabetic and having trouble with his feet hurting. He really needed this tonight. This is a shame!
customer_reviews.author: Dalevic

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST
customer_reviews.text: This foot spa is great, the temperature heat works great@ 105 I'm in heaven. It does go higher. The massage roller feel awesome. I suffer from plantar fasciitis and this is my new best friend.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Bulky...Hard to drain after use but worth the $$ for the thermostadt alone.
customer_reviews.text: Awkward to dump out the water after each use. Does not have a drain spigot. Also the bottom was hard to clean if you didn't wash it out each time. Materials felt cheap but the item worked well. I used bath salts too and had no issue with it breaking like some of the more expensive known brands. Thermostadt was amazing and convenient to have. It maintained the temperature well. It beats dumping hot water in a plastic bucket that vibrates like the super cheap ones. Overall..it was worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: NBA Films

customer_reviews.title: Electronics failed after 30 days
customer_reviews.text: I liked the unit until it broke. It only lasted 30 days. The electronics failed making it impossible to set the temperature and causing erratic temperature swings. The unit started clicking and the temperature display would just cycle through a range (see video). Fortunately it broke on the last possible day for a free return so I ordered a replacement. It's a gamble because there appears to be a lot of similar 1 star reviews.
customer_reviews.author: rdagger

customer_reviews.title: Ooooooo. . . . . feels so good. . .
customer_reviews.text: I spent a lot of time researching different foot spa products. This one seemed to have the most consistent positive reviews, so I have it a shot. It's wonderful. It's easy to regulate the temperature - I found 103 to be about right for me. The massaging rollers make using it a relaxing experience. The pumice stone included helps remove dead skin after a soak. I added peppermint and tea tree oil and a little Epsom salt, which softened up old calluses and left my toes tingling. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: TheEmpress

customer_reviews.title: Love...then leak.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted SO MUCH to love this. The temperature control and the bubbles are fantastic. But when I shut it off and lifted it up off the floor to empty it, there was a gigantic puddle. I lifted it higher and sure enough, it was leaking all over the floor. Maybe I can try and use it with towels around it, but I’m so incredibly disappointed. Everything else has been great so far, but leaking is a deal breaker for me.
customer_reviews.author: Phil R

customer_reviews.title: I used once so far. It heats and bubbles ...
customer_reviews.text: I used once so far.It heats and bubbles okay.My complaint is that you have to keep your legs at a 90 degree angle to it or the edge digs into your legs.Also,the hot water outlet burns your ankle at times if your foot too close to it.I was hoping to sit in my recliner with feet in it but it is uncomfortable that way.Need to sit in upright chair to use basically...
customer_reviews.author: George E.

customer_reviews.title: Worked for a grand total of 3 minutes
customer_reviews.text: Worked for about 3 minutes and started warming up water. Then went dead and now only shows a brief power light when plugged half way in but no power when fully plugged in. Don't waste your time.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Norgaard - BookNarrator. com

customer_reviews.title: Decent Footbath
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my girlfriend when she was about 6 month pregnant to help her sore swollen feet. She loved it a lot, but we did notice the stone insert for the middle was nowhere to be found. The waters were a little high/ narrow once her feet swelled up more and she could not use it at that point. The water gets very hot and holds the water well. Be careful not to get the display wet as it will turn on/off A LOT until it dries out.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Bassett

customer_reviews.title: Good features and function - wish the bottom were a bit smoother
customer_reviews.text: Foot bath was well priced for the features and functionality. Ive had no issues with it so all things considered - a really good purchase. Gave it 4 versus 5 stars because i find the protrusions on the bottom are actually so defined that they are a bit uncomfortable. I gather that's by design perhaps for circulation ? but it turns essentially negates the ability for this to be soothing. Not a deal breaker since everything else is great but wish it were just a bit longer and a bit more comfortable for the resting foot sole.
customer_reviews.author: Romeyd

customer_reviews.title: Love this spa!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this spa, it is well worth the money. I have an ankle sprain and needed to be able to help my healing along. This spa has a great heater that works perfectly and bubbles nicely. It is nice and deep so water doesn't splatter out onto the floor. You can add essential oils and Epsom Salts which is wonderful, not all spas allow this. I am thrilled with it and would buy it again tomorrow! Thank you for such a great quality item!
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: Safety Issue
customer_reviews.text: The unit is designed to default to 108 degrees when powered on. When I set the temperature to 102 degrees, the unit would vary the temperature on its own and has routinely gone as high as 115 degrees without warning. The company was slow to respond to my concerns, but eventually agreed to a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Abe

customer_reviews.title: It's true... Water LEAKED! Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: WARNING: Defective design. Water LEAKS no matter how good you take care of it. Bought it in March, started leaking September. It's not supposed to break for the price you pay for it. Recommending a re-design to fix this flaw. Requesting refund with company.
customer_reviews.author: MRBIGSTAKK

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This spa is very lightweight and easy to carry even when filled with water. It's easy to clean and store. At first I didn't like the massage rollers, but after a couple of uses, I can't do without them. My feet are smoother than they have been in years and the massage rollers and bubbles help with chronic foot pain. The water temp does fluctuate a bit, but the regulator is very responsive and it heats back up or cools down pretty quickly. I am very happy with this purchase. I do wish there was a little more room in the bottom and not sure I like the hard plastic nodules on the very bottom of the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Idaho Cowgirl

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and affordable!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my fianceé and here is her review: Amazing foot spa!!! The bubble setting, massage roller setting, and heat warmer settings really feel amazing, like in a real spa! Even has a timer, can use bath salts in it, and easy to clean. I'd recommend to anyone who is looking for an affordable foot spa after long day to treat yourself or use before giving yourself a pedi! Only thing I wish was in a different location is extra pedi attachments, because being in the center it is sometimes difficult to feel real benefits of them. The power cord could be longer too. *Try using with Bath & Body Works Aromatherapy products. Great relaxing scents!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: First impression - well made and delivers on its promises
customer_reviews.text: First impressions after one use of the Ivation Foot Spa Massager: This massager delivers the promised features - a combination of heat, bubbling water, and motorized foot massage. I poured tea tree powder into the bath and it dissolved easily into the water. The massager is capable of producing lots of heat - I had to dial it back from the maximum and found a comfortable hot temperature. The materials and construction are impressive, especially when I consider the reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money. Broke during 1st use.
customer_reviews.text: One of the bottom massage rollers broke the 1st time I used it. I was really hoping to get alot of use out of this but now I have to probably throw it out. Total waste of my money.
customer_reviews.author: destiny

customer_reviews.title: Cant run other features without the heat being on.
customer_reviews.text: I was under the impression I could use this without heat. I wanted a cold water bath with the other features. This product wont do that. Bubbles are a worthless feature, they are not strong enough to do anything. It does get warm fast, but I didn't want that. If that is what you are searching for this warmed up ice water fairly quickly. The rollers are ok. Overall the bottom is somewhat uncomfortable, but if you are just gently resting feet its not bad. I would imagine a unit half the price is just as good for my needs. Sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Real Review

customer_reviews.title: Love this spa and HIGHLY recommend it to everyone
customer_reviews.text: I have suffered with burning, tingly, and numb feet for about 6-12 months. I was desperate to find help for my feet, without oral medications. I decided to try this spa and ebsom salt with tea tree oil. Within 48 hours, my feet have improved! Numbness is almost completely gone, just a small amount of tingling and no more burning. My feet are able to feel again! Just 20 min a night, 105 degrees, and ebsom salt with tea tree oil. I feel a new beginning. Love this spa and HIGHLY recommend it to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: RinzlerIOI

customer_reviews.title: It Leaked all over my carpet the first time I Used It.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of the heat feature which others did not have and the depth of the bowl for my feet. However, it leaked and when I called the number on their Product Information pamphlet they were not helpful and told me to call Amazon rather than them. It lead to a difficult situation. They did not take responsibility for the malfunction of their own product. After a few calls, Amazon refunded my money and the cost of shipping. Glad they took responsibility. I bought another product locally rather than go through that again!
customer_reviews.author: Jayne

customer_reviews.title: Broke after using it ONCE!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item about a year ago exactly. Loved it at first. It had all the features I wanted and made a huge difference after one use., and it worked great. When I tried to use it again, NOTHING. The electronic panel would beep but was otherwise completely useless. That was a really expensive lesson called "I'll never buy another one!"
customer_reviews.author: Lyn McCloskey

customer_reviews.title: ELECTRICAL SHOCK WARNING!
customer_reviews.text: BUYER BEWARE!!! I loved my little foot spa for the first 2 times I used it.... Until on the 3rd try It literally shocked me!! Went to turn it off by the touch pad and it was super hot! Purchased just a little over a year ago (2019) was a bit expensive so expected better quality and performance, disappointing for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Shari

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love.
customer_reviews.text: I normally don't write reviews for anything because most of them are fake and who really reads these anyway... but this thing has CHANGED MY LIFE. I can never not have one of these at home now. Low noise level, perfect vibration strength, easy to use, temp control is wonderful, different attachments to rub my feet in all the right ways. There's enough room to move my feet to get the pressure points, and the massage rollers are just tough enough to work some magic without making me cringe. The only issue I see is that my calves need a little more comfortable resting space, but a small towel on the edge worked out fine.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Lee Elsass Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Treat Yourself!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I’ve used this at a friend’s house before, which prompted my purchase. It definitely helped that the price decreased from when I initially looked it up! All features and add ons were included in package, just as advertised. Heater had a little trouble the first use with dropping temp. I was able to turn up the heat and once it reached the (new) heat level, I was able to turn it down to my desired temp. Didn’t have any issues after that so I’m guessing that it was just a fluke. Overall great product. I’ve already recommended to friends and family, including screen shots and links :)
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas C.

customer_reviews.title: Shocked me!
customer_reviews.text: The product worked well for 2 years. One day I was done using it, touched the power button to turn it off and i got Shocked! I immediately took my feet out. I am throwing the unit out! Will NEVER purchase from this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: R.H.

customer_reviews.title: Leaks! Don't buy it.
customer_reviews.text: First purchased foot spa didnt work after 2 uses. Seller had good communication and offered a replacement. I just attempted to use the new one and when I filled it with water, the water leaked out the bottom. I'm kinda fed up and just want a refund at this point but I know that won't happen. Waste of hard earned money and time. Cheap product.
customer_reviews.author: Natina

customer_reviews.title: The most awesome foot spa I ever owned!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my foot spa! It keeps the water piping hot during my entire one-hour soak. The bubbles feel wonderful! I am also able to use my Epsom salts, which many similar foot spas do NOT allow. I have used other foot spas and they were definitely inferior to this one. The handle makes it easy for me to carry it, since I suffer with Rheumatoid Arthritis. Cleaning was also a breeze! I highly recommend this foot spa. You won't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised but would prefer it to be wider
customer_reviews.text: Revised: just over 10 months of frequent use, works as advertised, I totally recommend this fiit spa, would give it a 5th star if there was more room in the width, because for men it's uncomfortable to keep two feet / legs so close together for 20-30 min or longer. I overcompensate by moving feet around and by taking foot/feet out occasionally. Each time I use I place a xxvi of Epsom salt and a chiseled drops of essential oil. After each use I clean tub out thoroughly.
customer_reviews.author: Phil B.

customer_reviews.title: Temperature control broken after only 2 months!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this for about 3 months. As you can see in the video I posted. The temperature control no longer works. It just goes crazy and I can’t change it to be at the temp I want! So disappointing because I really liked this when it worked correctly! Definitely will not be recommending!
customer_reviews.author: Eavd90

customer_reviews.title: Leaks/RESOLVED!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Heater, bubbles work great. Started leaking after a month. So disappointed because we bought several for Christmas gifts. Update 1/9/2019: I removed the bottom plate, added water to determine where leak was coming from. Applied silicone around orange circular light covers (source of leak). No more leaking! Also, customer service emailed me after my review. To my surprise I received a replacement spa today. Very pleased with customer service. So happy to resolve the issue because the spa is truly wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah E. Zuendel

customer_reviews.title: god i love this thing
customer_reviews.text: i bought this a while ago but i just wanted to give it a great review that it deserves. I LOVE THIS THING !! i bought it when i was working a lot so my feet would be really sore after work. this thing is the ultimate relaxation for your feet. the water heats up very fast and it gets really hot! the only downside i would say is because it’s electric you have to use it near an outlet and it’s pretty heavy especially when it’s full of water so it’s a little difficult when you’re done and gotta dump the water out. but i would 100% recommend this for anyone whose feet are exhausted
customer_reviews.author: Emerson and Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Great foot spa!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this foot spa for my circulation and it seems to be helping with that. My feet are always cold. The bubbles and heater features are really nice. I guess I have sensitive feet because the massage rollers do start to irritate my feet if I don’t keep moving my feet on them. I haven’t read any other reviews complaining about it so I think it’s a sensitivity issue. I usually do the massage feature only the last three to five minutes now. Really nice product overall. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Treat yo' self!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Ivaton foot spa for my wife who has plantar fasciitis. She has to roll out her heels often and having the extra element of heat seems to help. The spa stays hot for a long period of time and the massager is powerful enough to dig into the heel if you want it to. The other key features we like is the handle, which makes it easy to carry from the bathtub into the sun room.
customer_reviews.author: Travis D

customer_reviews.title: Really heats the water good and hot
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes this thing starts and stops functions on its own, Bubbles are a bit weak. Heat stops working then you have to raise the setting to get it to kick back on. Other than that it is OK. Really heats the water good and hot!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Gillis

customer_reviews.title: 19 months of ownership, no longer works
customer_reviews.text: Worked well, as expected, for a year, or so. Then did not use it for six months. Tried it again tonight. Got OF message and no response from the keyboard. and so guess it's now broken and out of warrantee, despite light use. No place to go for for tech support, so guess it's a dead duck. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: CT Steve

customer_reviews.title: Five Star
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I had to update my initial review. After CS contacted me and offered to replace the defective unit, I have been able to test it and I can say I really enjoy this one. The water heats up in just a few small minutes and the rollers are good at massaging the base of your feet so long as your not pressing them hard. Customer service was superb in keeping in touch and I definitely recommend the unit.
customer_reviews.author: J.C.

customer_reviews.title: P
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: After reading my original review, they immediately sent me a new unit. I very much appreciate their fast and considerate response. I'm updating the stars to four. If this unit holds up, I'll change it to five later. PREVIOUS REVIEW: I used it once and then the on/off switch quit working so I couldn't turn it on. Also, the bumps on the bottom of the unit hurt my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This foot bath is amazing
customer_reviews.text: Massage, temperature control, bubbles. Helps when my feet are especially sore. I have fibromyalgia. My partner spoiled me with this foot bath after I needed a matrixectomy for a badly ingrown toenail but I am still getting use out of it long after that has healed.
customer_reviews.author: T.

customer_reviews.title: I have lost count at how many foot spas I have gotten only to be completely disappointed and wasted money to send them back
customer_reviews.text: This Foot Spa finally turned out to be as it is advertised! I have lost count at how many foot spas I have gotten only to be completely disappointed and wasted money to send them back. My search is over.....this is the best one out there!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing
customer_reviews.text: This unit is beautiful. It is absolutely worth the price. I add menthol epsom salt to the water and in 3-5 minutes I have an amazing hot foot soak with massage rollers working the bottoms. Within 10 minutes I forget the 20 miles I put on working as a server!!!
customer_reviews.author: pamela wiggins

customer_reviews.title: Good features, but poor durabilty.
customer_reviews.text: Product features are great, but after a few uses the timer button already quit working. It should be better build for the price.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: WORTH it!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS THING! I looked around for the best foot spa, I wanted something worth the the money that would heat and move the water —this does it! The water gets soooo hot, up to 119 degrees and the bubbles and vibrations feel great! Have already recommended to all my friends kissing pedicures! This is even better than going to the salon!
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn

customer_reviews.title: A Good Girlfriend Gift
customer_reviews.text: Pretty simple to operate. Bought it for my girlfriend for Xmas at her request, though I researched available foot spas before deciding on this model. Highly rated at Amazon and elsewhere. My girlfriend deserves to be in a good mood at the end of a long workday, and this spa does the job. Temperature controlled. She starts out at below 100 degrees and steadily works up to 108. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Will Ravenel

customer_reviews.title: Broke after less than a week of use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a friend for her birthday. She loves soaking her feet multiple times a week. It broke the first week she used it, started leaking water from the bottom. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Pedersen

customer_reviews.title: So relaxing!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I was having foot pain from bunions. I use it while sitting at my desk working - my feet are super happy! My complaints are minor - the buttons are kind of hard to see with the design on the display; it has a fairly short cord; the fill lines are kind of hard to see; the massage rollers are annoying and uncomfortable so I don't use them. The pros outweigh the cons though! It heats quickly and maintains the heat perfectly and has been super reliable. One of my favorite "luxury" purchases ever!
customer_reviews.author: VWHITMORE

customer_reviews.title: Entire product feature no longer works
customer_reviews.text: Product began to malfunction after only a few uses. Have not used this product more than 6 times. After that bubble function no longer began to work. Unable to return as window to do so has passed unfortunate as the product worked well but losing a whole function is a pretty drastic product issue. Would not recommend due to possibility of this happening.
customer_reviews.author: jashve

customer_reviews.title: Leaked after the first run
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased this product and was hoping to give it to my grandmother as a Christmas gift. I filled up and powered on the foot spa to make sure that it worked and it began to leak. Needless to say I am very disappointed. Is there any way that I could receive a replacement so that it has a chance of arriving before Christmas? I will update this posting if the issue is resolved.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Kunrath

customer_reviews.title: Not meant for wide feet
customer_reviews.text: If you wear a size 9.5 or smaller shoe size in women's and if you have regular to narrow feet this product is for you. If you have wide feet you feel the heater heating the water and it gets hot. Doesn't bubble as much as I saw in another review with video. Heat is adjustable that's a plus, roller work well
customer_reviews.author: Luci Budd

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 3 uses
customer_reviews.text: It started off great and then by the third use it was broken. Amazon customer service took no calls and there was no way for me to return it so I paid a lot of money for 3 foot baths. Don’t buy not worth the money and the disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Cora Spearman

customer_reviews.title: I'm talking painful. The second issue is the heater which works ...
customer_reviews.text: The unit works as stated but a major flaw is the bottom has little knobby things that ware the bottom of your feet out. I'm talking painful. The second issue is the heater which works well but is located at the backend where your ankles are. When on, the heat coming off of this will literally feel like it is blistering your skin. I would turn it on long enough to get it up to temp before I put my feet in and then leave it off for the duration. Would not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: SEG

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I've had some before that claim to heat the water or at least keep it warm, and so far this is the only one that has effectively done both. It is light weight, easy to carry and use and deep enough to go above ankles.
customer_reviews.author: cfdz

customer_reviews.title: Great product so far
customer_reviews.text: This has been key in treating my plantar fasciiitis. I was concerned that my size 13 feet would not fit, but there is plenty of room, enough that move my feet back and forth over the rollers. Through several dozen uses, it has held up fine, rollers, heater and bubbles all continue to work.
customer_reviews.author: KCol

customer_reviews.title: This product much better than the first one I purchased.
customer_reviews.text: This is a much better product than the foot spa I purchased earlier. Heats faster and vibration strength are excellent. Much better constructed and hopefully should last. Less chance of electric shock with this brand!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Family loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Nice and deep, kept the water warm. Daughter dropped in a small bath fizzy, and the massaging water helped her sore feet. My other daughter and husband loved it too! The handle makes it easy to carry and remove the water. I'm glad my family is happy with this purchase. It costs more than most others, and it's worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth F.

customer_reviews.title: This item was unsatisfactory
customer_reviews.text: It didn’t operate. I like the feel of bubble water and this item bubbles didn’t work on the left side and very little on the right side.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: So far highly recommended. Will give another review in several months
customer_reviews.text: lI have had this product for Proximately three weeks and it has worked exactly asa advertised. I place salt in my water and this is the only Spa that has not broke down from the Salt usage. So far highly recommended. Will give another review in several months.
customer_reviews.author: ronald lewis

customer_reviews.title: Erratic performance
customer_reviews.text: Every so often the massage rollers turn on even though I have them turned off. It surprises me by tickling my feet causing me to splash water on the floor. Sometimes the heated water burns.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Engel

customer_reviews.title: Heats excellent! I use it all the time. Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this one after I returned one from bed, bath and beyond that didn’t heat or keep the heat at all. This one is wayyy better. I don’t even worry about putting hot water in this one from the start as it heats so fast and well. Very impressed with the heater. I use it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Zack

customer_reviews.title: SOOO GOOOD
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always loved foot spas, but hated that the water gets cold within minutes. This heats up fairly quickly, just a few minutes, and heats up hot!! It goes up to 122 but personally 110 is the most I can handle. My husband has size 13 feet and he can comfortably use this as well. I don’t LOVE the “massager” but I just don’t use it. I will definitely be buying 2 more for my mother and mother in law.
customer_reviews.author: brittany

customer_reviews.title: Affordable simple. Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my husband size 12 fits comfortable. Only issue we both had was it's a tad uncomfortable on the back of the ankle. It's not that big of a deal. I rolled a towel and put it behind my ankles when sitting still and not moving my feet on the rollers. We both love it otherwise. It does get hot fast but there's good temp control. The rollers are good. It's simple and for the price a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Kaye Jaye

customer_reviews.title: Temperature Control stopped working after 6 weeks
customer_reviews.text: The handle is a nice feature for carrying and dumping the water. The depth and size are adequate for soakin Bubbles and lights are a nice feature, but not necessary I liked the concept, but this product needs some redesigning. Temperature control would not stop even when set at a lower temp(99degrees) it continued to scalding level Massage is too strong, needs variable speed control Pumps on the bottom are uncomfortable Heaters get very hot and cause burning sensation near heels It is easy to use when the temperature control dial works and heaters are not so hot. The push button options are nice but do not work properly for than a few weeks
customer_reviews.author: RDD

customer_reviews.title: Not sure why other people complain
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure if people just don’t read instructions or what but this is just amazing pedicure bowl. The closest I’ll find to actually going to the spa. The bubbles a bit weak But still great and the heat can get really hot but the auto massagers are amazing!! I will definitely change my review if anything changes but so far I’m happy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ran into an issue, but resolved quickly
customer_reviews.text: I love this foot spa, it's been amazing, but after 2 months the control panel stopped working. I emailed the companies customer service, and they responded within a couple hours. They are shipping me a new one free of charge and without having to do an exchange. (I believe it has a 1 year warranty)
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria S.

customer_reviews.title: Best Foot Spa I’ve Had
customer_reviews.text: Great product and a great price. It only took roughly 6 minutes to heat my water from 94 degrees to 107 and maintained that temperature through my 30 minute session. The rollers and feel great. I’ve had others in the past and this one knocks them out of the park!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my wife who is on her feet nearly all day as a preschool teacher. She absolutely loves it. It's easy to use, easy to clean and works really well. Haven't used the little attachments for the center all that much but that feature didn't really mean much to me or her for that matter anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Jer

customer_reviews.title: Not the product I was expecting for the money
customer_reviews.text: arthritic foot nueropathy was the reason I ordered it. I expected stronger bubble flow. Instructions made reference to high and low water level. Found no such markings on product. Bottom of pan had bumps that were uncomfortable. Water temp was hard to adjust. rotating rollers on bottom were too hard on feet.
customer_reviews.author: John Zoltner

customer_reviews.title: the excellent heating, the bubbles
customer_reviews.text: Bought for friends for Christmas, and that hardworking couple LOVES this thing...the excellent heating, the bubbles, the massage rollers, the generous proportions that tired man-feet can fit in unless you're Shaquille, the handle for moving this around to fill, empty, or simply reposition. I'm happy with the price I paid to be able to give a truly appreciated gift. I'm thinking now I need one for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Gerg Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Foot spa
customer_reviews.text: Real nice item. Arrived on time and and as described. So so bubbling power but the automatic rolling massagers are great and the heating element is awesome. All in all a better than average machine.
customer_reviews.author: David P. Stromer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: My fiancé and I have had this foot spa about a year now and it’s great for at an at home spa. It bubbles, vibrates and massages. Only suggestion is to use warm water when filling because if it’s cold it takes a very long time to heat up. It comes w cool accessories too. I see other people have had a bad experience in here with it. But luckily we got a good one and actually heating mine up now.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Montesdeoca

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It has some very useful features such as maintaining a temperature and bubble feature as well as a foot massager. The design is very comfortable. And surprisingly the water heated up fairly quickly and the best part is it holds whatever temperature you set- end it also has a timer that is very useful. Tired feet your savior has arrived!
customer_reviews.author: Musikman

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product! Wish the bubbles were a bit stronger
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product! Wish the bubbles were a bit stronger, but it stays super hot and the massager are awesome. Am definitely getting one for mom and mother in law for Christmas
customer_reviews.author: Devon Sopita

customer_reviews.title: One leaked water. One works great.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two. One works perfectly. Keeps water nice and hot. One tub of water leaked all over my carpet during first use. I read about it happening to many others who've bought this. It was a huge mess. Be sure to put a plastic shoe tray under it to catch water if needed.
customer_reviews.author: healthnut

customer_reviews.title: Worth the high cost
customer_reviews.text: Love this foot tub! Broke my ankle last year and love to soak my feet with some Epsom salts for swelling, etc. My hubby also likes to enjoy a nice relaxing foot soak from time to time now as well 😊 Would definitely recommend this one even at the high price point but worth it if you would use often.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Idunate

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this foot bath. I thought it was a bit pricey for a foot bath though, but I still decided to buy based on the good reviews. I love the temp control. This makes your water super hot for intense pain relief and the good thing is that you control how hot or wArm you want the water. I also like the handle for carrying convenience . The rollers provide good massage also. I completely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cam

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: The only reason that I am giving this a 4 instead of 5 stars is because I think that those rollers are a waste because they only get a small part of your foot. Also, the location of the heating element can burn your heals of your not carful. But all complaints aside, The constant heat and bubbles are wonderful and have helped me get my diabetic feet feeling healthy again!
customer_reviews.author: Candy Cane

customer_reviews.title: Wife is happy
customer_reviews.text: Great features, good vibration, good carry handle and great temperature control.
customer_reviews.author: timothy m

customer_reviews.title: I was not disappointed with the Ivation Foot Spa Massager
customer_reviews.text: After buy foot baths and returning because the water heating function did not work...I searched online for one positive comments and high ratings...I was not disappointed with the Ivation Foot Spa Massager!!! It met all my expectations! The water temperature was controlled and maintained,, the massager and bubbles were very relaxing. Thank you for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase again
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. It is heavy when filled. I am glad it has a handle.
customer_reviews.author: Myrna

customer_reviews.title: Good foot bath.
customer_reviews.text: seems overpriced for what it is... but cest la internet. You don't always get what you pay for. But you pay for what you get. Wish it was a touch quieter. The bubbles are useless. Turn em off and its near silent. We watch tv while my wife soaks. no leaks. Does everything the box says it does. Gets super hot or not. Watch your temp settings.
customer_reviews.author: B-row

customer_reviews.title: There’s So Much to LOVE !
customer_reviews.text: The spa foot massager exceeds all of my expectations. I love the heating and timer features. The water stays at your desired temperature for the entire massage. The unit is deep enough to soak your feet without worrying about splashing water everywhere. LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.author: JDub

customer_reviews.title: Super Great Foot Spa
customer_reviews.text: The product is excellent. First time use last night. It maintained the water at the designated temp the entire time while in use. Easily transported with full of water using the handle. It was a total enjoyment. If you are looking for a foot spa, this is the one to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Cecil Brown

customer_reviews.title: Your feet feel wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I'm diabetic and have problems with my feet. This foot spa has helped get the feeling back into the feet. The massage roller tickled at first, but then I figured out how much pressure to apply to foot/feet to get a proper massage and now I look forward to my morning and before bed massage. I use the massager, heat and bubbles all together. LOVE, LOVE this Product.
customer_reviews.author: VAL

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: Becomes plenty hot...air bubbles not very strong...rollers are a nice touch. If you ever need to do alternating hot,cold treatments, for an injury this works great as well.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor O' Reilly

customer_reviews.title: Great relief!!!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this he is a mailman and walks alot. This heats up quick and massages his feet. It helps him a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie  Victorino

customer_reviews.title: Happy feet
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift from my husband. I work 1o hour shifts on my feet and they hurt pretty bad. This was a wonderful at relieving my arch and heel pain. The temperature control was amazing & the massaging roller as well.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ildefonso

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for the first 6 months. Now it won't heat up at all. Very disappointing. Edit: The company reached out to me very quickly and worked to resolve the matter. The customer service was unparalleled. I would highly recommend this product and company, Thank You!
customer_reviews.author: MamaMoe

customer_reviews.title: This one works!
customer_reviews.text: This was my second try at a foot spa purchase. The massage function is optional up to 107 degrees, which I appreciated. My feet are fairly sensitive but the rollers were a nice addition. I would pre-heat the water a bit to save some time. I like the deeper basin and it seems well constructed. It's a wonderful indulgence on a cold winter's night.
customer_reviews.author: CBD

customer_reviews.title: Many features and compact
customer_reviews.text: Compared this carefully and thought this one did more than other similar foot spa massagers.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Works wonderfully, but needs an extension cord
customer_reviews.text: Recieved this for Christmas and I absolutely love it. It heats up pretty quickly, you can control the temperature easily. The massage rollers are wonderful. The bubbles are slightly lacking, but that's really not a big deal. You may want to get an extension cord though (3 prongs btw), because the cord is very short.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Glad I Bought This!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice product. I like that it seems to have a deeper reservoir than some others I looked at and is roomy. The bubbles are gentle, and the water temperature maintains well. I find myself using the massage rollers quite often as I soak. Can roll from heels to toes and back. The brush attachment is nice, too.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Hot, warm, great for staying home.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the foot-bath last year, and have been using it almost daily. The unit is sturdy, and well made. But this does not mean you can be careless with it. Keeping the front moisture/splash guard down. Being sure to fill it with out getting any water on the display, are all needed. As is cleaning it down afterwards. Like anything, the more care and attention it is given, the better it will perform. Bought a second unit for my partner, as he often wants to steal it away from me.

customer_reviews.title: The best features ever on a home foot spa
customer_reviews.text: The best features ever on a home foot spa. My daughter is a dancer and fell in love with mine. Guess what she is getting for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Hi it's kimberly

product_meta.title: Ivation Foot Spa Massager - Heated Bath, Automatic Massage Rollers, Vibration, Bubbles, Digital Adjustable Temperature Control, 3 Pedicure Attachments
feature_bullets: RELIEVE SORE, WORNOUT FEET – Multifunction Massaging Foot Spa Comforts Achy Heels, Toes, Arches & Ankles; Ideal for Athletes & People Who Work on Their Feet
INTENSE VIBRATING MASSAGE – Invigorating Vibration Encourages Circulation & Soothes Weary Feet; Activate Motorized Rollers to Target Tense & Tired Soles
OXYGENATING BUBBLE ACTION – Multiple Water Jets Create Thousands of Calming Bubbles to Relieve Pressure & Pain; Add Essential Oil for Aromatherapy
THE HEALING POWER OF HEAT – Water Warms Up to 122° F for Relaxing Spa Experience; Control Temperature to Help Swelling, Throbbing, Redness & More
ADVANCED LED DISPLAY – Sophisticated System Features Timer & Multifunction Selection; Includes Free Brush & Acupressure Pedicure Attachments

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
